WRITING.TEXT: If it's not a STEM degree, then chances are your degree is useless (unless its Law).

Unfortunately, the chances of you being a superhero are pretty slim. There are roughly about 10 characters from Earth who have superpowers in the MCU. If we divide this by the population of the world (roughly 7.125 billion), your chance of being a superhero is an estimated 1.40350877e-7%, which is really low.
As a normal guy, you'll be facing a lot more danger than in the real world, especially with a world conquerer like Thanos who is to appear soon.
The best way to approach someone without seeming awkward is to go in knowing you won't be awkward.
Yeah I'd probably say 15 and above, but it really comes down to how mature they are.
